public interface IEndpoint

  • Methodendetails

    • buildRequest

      okhttp3.Request buildRequest() throws Exception
      Method used for building request, that does not require a body. If this method is called for a PaperlessEndpoint instance with a method that requires a body, usually an exception is thrown.
      Gibt zurück:
      The built request
      Löst aus:
      Exception - When this method is called for operations that require a body

    • buildRequest

      okhttp3.Request buildRequest(@NotNull IDto body) throws Exception
      Builds the request object depending on the configuration of the endpoint instance.
      Parameter:
      body - Body to send. If configured operation of the endpoint does not require a body, buildRequest() is called instead
      Gibt zurück:
      Generated request object
      Löst aus:
      Exception - Thrown if instance is not configured correctly

    • parseResponse

      IDto parseResponse(@NotNull okhttp3.Response response) throws Exception
      Parses response object to paperless IDto object
      Parameter:
      response - Response of the api call
      Gibt zurück:
      Parsed response
      Löst aus:
      Exception - Thrown due to various reasons

    • getMethods

      List<MethodC> getMethods()
      Get a list of all possible methods for endpoint instance
      Gibt zurück:
      List of all methods

    • action

      void action(@NotNull ActionC action)
      Convenience method for deciding on a http method for the endpoint.
      Parameter:
      action - Action the endpoint should execute

    • method

      void method(@NotNull MethodC method)
      Explicitly set the http method the endpoint should execute
      Parameter:
      method - HTTP Method

    • query

      void query(@NotNull Map<String,String> query)
      Adds the url query to the endpoint
      Parameter:
      query -
